QuestData.Title: Inform Leoroxx!
QuestData.Description: Quickly, you must inform Leoroxx of what is transpiring up at Razaan's Landing!$B$BThose orbs were comprised of souls, some of them Mok'Nathal!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Leoroxx about what the Razaani ethereal are up to. He can be found at Mok'Nathal Village in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: What you say, is it even possible? What am I saying? Of course it is, if the spiritcallers say so.$B$BRemember before when I said that we might need your further assistance? It would seem that I can tell the future.
